glosses: Abbreviation of päivänä (essive singular of päivä).

forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.

words.etymology_text: Latin pneumaticus > German pneumatisch > Swedish pneumatisk > pneumaatt- + -inen
Internationalism (see English pneumatics). Contains the suffix -iikka.

glosses: pneumococcus (bacterium Streptococcus pneumoniae, which causes pneumonia)

categories: Finnish terms derived from Ancient Greek

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English pneumonia), ultimately from Ancient Greek πνευμονία (pneumonía).
